rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with coat closet and storage, following Vastu by aligning the main entrance in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjacent to kitchen for Scandinavian minimalism. Large windows for natural light oriented east or south per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with sliding doors to the balcony, promoting family interaction and aligning with Vastu guidelines for dining spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchen designed in Scandinavian style with energy-efficient appliances. Vastu compliant by keeping water elements to the east side.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom with essential facilities, located near living area for convenience, following local norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Store
rooms.description: Additional storage space for cleaning supplies and other utilities. Placed in a corner to maintain balance per Vastu.

openings.notes: Aligned with the auspicious direction as per Vastu, ensuring positive energy flow.
Large windows to let in ample natural light, supporting Scandinavian design principles.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan for convenience and safety.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining balcony. Designed in Scandinavian style using minimal decor and light color palette.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring privacy and ample natural light following Vastu guidelines by placing the bed on the south side.

rooms.name: Shared Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom for both bedrooms designed for functionality and simplicity, complying with local building norms.

openings.notes: Each bedroom has a balcony door that opens to the exterior for ventilation and natural light, following Scandinavian open design principles.
Optimized window placements for maximum daylight while maintaining privacy, adhering to Vastu guidelines by orienting windows appropriately.
